name: FF14 P7S Harvest Simulator
description:
This is a simulator to practice the 3 final mechanics of P7S raid encounter in Final Fantasy 14.  

For scoring 

 For both war and famine, you have to be near the green person to be right 

For Death, you have to be at the correct role location 

Death  uses the braindead strategy

War uses the Imuaru Strategy.

This is for solo practice and learning at a much faster pace than waiting 8 minutes into the fight to work on it.  The 3d simulator online is wonderful, but you need a full group to be able to practice it, and sometimes have a Que and a 20 min time limit.

Goodluck!
